resources.string: %1$s ok b\'el naj toj makb\'ila t-xk\'utz\'ib\'.
Aj tenb\'il %1$s ok b\'el naj toj tmakb\'ila t-xk\'utz\'ib\'.
Qe\' %1$d te u\'jb\'il ex qe\' tenb\'il toj kytenb\'il %2$s ok b\'el naj toj tmakb\'ila t-xk\'utz\'ib\'a.
Jaqb\'il swej te b\'etb\'il toj chemaj xin.
Lametil swej te b\'etb\'il toj chemajxin
K\'amol u\'jb\'il toj Bloom toj jun xk\'utz\'ib\' toj taq\'nab\'il Wifi
Ma kanet %1$s\", at aq\'na\'b\'il lu\' toj.
Ma kanet jun ak\'aj aq\'na\'b\'il te %1$s\" tojtzaj %2$s\", in qanin…
At jun min xb\'ant. Qa atix tlok\', jaku kub\' b\'inchet juntl maj.
Njyet tqanil kyi\'j u\'jb\'il toj chemajxin te WiFi %1s…
Tenb\'il jatum b\'a\'n tu\'n qokx toj \"hotspot\" te makb\'il xk\'utz\'ib\'
Mixti\' tok tmakb\'il xk\'utz\'ib\' ti\'j chemajxin te WiFi.
Bloom Reader was not able to read the book \"%1$s\".
Mixti\' xb\'ant qokx toj k\'ub\'il aq\'untl. Taj makb\'il xk\'utz\'ib\' SD?
In order to use this app, you will need to update the Android System WebView from the Google Play Store and then restart the app.

string.name: share_app_link
string.u: Pujb\'ankub\'a tb\'eyil tu\'ntzun tkanet Bloom Reader toj Google Play

resources.string: ¡Pujb\'ankub\'a aq\'untl Bloom Reader kyuk\'il juntl tuk\'ila!
Pujb\'ankub\'a kyaqil u\'jb\'il tuk\'il jun tuk\'ila at Bloom Reader tuk\'il.
U\'jil u\'jb\'il Bloom tuk\'il aq\'unb\'il xk\'utz\'ib\' %1$s:
Mixti\' xb\'ant tsipet k\'ub\'il aq\'untl xk\'utz\'ib\'.
Atx taj u\'jb\'il %1$s. B\'ala at taq toj jun Sd ma qa o tx\'ixpet mo o tz\'el iq\'i\'n to\'j.
Min b\'ant jaqet u\'jb\'il. Qaj ma jaw noj tnab\'l makb\'il xk\'utz\'ib\'. B\'inchanx jun majtl aj tel tiq\'ina toj tnab\'l.
Mya\' nim temb\'il toj tnab\'l makb\'il xk\'utz\'ib\' kye kyaqil u\'jb\'il lu\'.
There was a problem reading %1$s. Try downloading it again.
Min ma chi okyal ak\'a\'j u\'jb\'il mo tnej Bloom toj makb\'il xk\'utz\'ib\' lu\'.
K\'amol u\'jb\'il ntzaj q\'o\'n toj xk\'utz\'ib\'
Bloom Reader is ready to receive books via USB cable from the Bloom Editor program
Please send a book from Bloom Editor and then choose this command again
Taj Bloom Reader amb\'il tu\'n tokx toj k\'ub\'il kye qe nak\'ub\'il aq\'unb\'il tu\'ntzan taq\'unan.
In ok q\'etl juntl tb\'i u\'jb\'il mixti\' xk\'amli %1$s
Bloom Reader will need your permission to show the books on your SD Card. After you touch \"OK\", Android will open a window. Touch the button that looks like this:
Get more books from our library
To receive books via USB, you will need to give Bloom Reader permission to use the \"Bloom\" folder at the root of Internal Storage. Touch \"USE THIS FOLDER\"
To find lost books, you will need to give Bloom Reader permission to use the \"Bloom\" folder at the root of Internal Storage. Touch \"USE THIS FOLDER\"
To finish setting up stats reporting, you will need to give Bloom Reader permission to use the \"Bloom\" folder at the root of Internal Storage. Touch \"USE THIS FOLDER\"
We would like to record your city because the people who share these books for free like to know where their books are being read.
Authors & Illustrators like to know where their free books are being read. But we need you to turn on your device\'s ability to use its GPS Location Service
